<JD_START>
Job Title: Intermodal Owner Operator Class A CDL

Location: Memphis, TN

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Business Development, Sales

Description:
Owner Operator Wanted – Home Daily - Sign on Bonus $5,000.00 Are you ready to take control of your career and drive towards success? Look no further! We're seeking skilled Intermodal Owner-Operators to join our thriving team, to service national account customers. General Express, a division of the ARL Network, are committed to providing top-notch support, competitive compensation, and a collaborative work environment where your success is our priority. As part of our commitment to excellence, we need experienced owner-operators to provide top-notch service to our dedicated domestic customers. 
Compensation: Average Weekly Settlements $3,300 - $3,500+ per week $5,000 Sign on Retention Bonus opportunity Clean roadside inspection safety bonus opportunities 
We Offer the Following: 70% linehaul revenue 100% of fuel surcharge Paid detention at rails after 1 hour. Year round work available No touch freight Work Monday – Friday (Saturday volunteer loads available) 10 –12-hour day, average start time is 5am - 7am Home Nightly Weekly Settlements w/ Direct Deposit Maintenance Fund Program Comdata Fuel Card w/ Fuel Discount Program No forced dispatch 
Service Area: 250-mile radius of Memphis We service the 5 Memphis Railroads and all depots. 
Job Requirements Must have class-A CDL and be registered in the state of residence Must be at least 23 years old Must have at least 2 years of verifiable intermodal experience Must have at least 6 months of verifiable container experience Must hold a valid CDL appropriate for vehicles operation Must be compliant with state and federal laws applicable to vehicles operating Must have a clean driving record 2005-year model truck or newer Must be willing to complete a pre-employment drug screen 
If you're ready to take control of your career and drive towards success, we want to hear from you! Apply now to become a valued member of our team and experience the difference with General Express. 
How to Apply: Interested candidates can apply online by copying and pasting the following link into their web browser: https://intelliapp.driverapponline.com/c/arltransport?r=1751 
Contact Information: For any inquiries or additional information, please contact Leigh-Ann Husted at 901-463-2930 or recruiting@genxtn.com

Experience Level (if available): None
<JD_END>
